ThreeShift.name: Three Shift
ThreeShift.description: Our troops are off in three shifts.
ThreeShift.effect: Twice the manpower in this phase, and half the manpower in the next phase
ThreeShift.shortDescription: twice the manpower, and then half

TricksOfTheTrade.name: Tricks of the Trade
TricksOfTheTrade.description: No. 1 words that thy don't want to hear when signing a contract : "Font size minimum 10. Please."
TricksOfTheTrade.effect: Current remaining snow -20%, reduce upper favor -20
TricksOfTheTrade.shortDescription: reduce remaining snow and upper favor

Snowplow.name: Snowplow
Snowplow.effect: The range of soldiers becomes 1 cell in the y range direction, and the x range increases by +n for the reduced y range.
Snowplow.shortDescription: Reinforce the soldier. Increase chance of runaway

Broom.name: Broom
Broom.effect: When stacking snow in a cell adjacent to a cell where snow is accumulated more than 50%, speed +10, does not stack snow in a cell where snow is more than 75%.
Broom.shortDescription: Reinforce the soldier. Increase chance of runaway

SnowShovel.name: SnowShovel
SnowShovel.effect: Increases x range by +n for the number of cells where snow is accumulated more than 75% within range, does not stack snow in cells where snow is less than 50%.
SnowShovel.shortDescription: Reinforce the soldier. Increase chance of runaway

HawkEye.name: Hawk eye
HawkEye.effect: The range of soldiers decreases by -1 on the y range, increases by +2 on the x range
HawkEye.shortDescription: Reinforce the soldier. Increase chance of runaway

FocusedAttack.name: Focused Attack
FocusedAttack.effect: Make the range of the soldier with the narrowest range 1*1 and increase speed*n for the reduced area.
FocusedAttack.shortDescription: Reinforce the soldier. Increase chance of runaway

Relax.name: Relax
Relax.description: Reduce the y range of the soldier with the widest range by -1, increase speed*n for the reduced area
Relax.shortDescription: Reinforce the soldier. Increase chance of runaway

DefendTheArea.name: Defend The Area
DefendTheArea.effect: No other soldier overlaps within the range of the fastest soldier
DefendTheArea.shortDescription: Reinforce the soldier. Increase chance of runaway

MutualSurveillance.name: Mutual Surveillance
MutualSurveillance.shortDescription: Reinforce the soldier. Increase chance of runaway

LeaveTheWounded.name: Leave the Wounded
LeaveTheWounded.effect: Make the range of weakened soldiers 1 cell and reduce the temptation of strengthened soldiers by -20%
LeaveTheWounded.shortDescription: Reinforce the soldier. Increase chance of runaway

CupNoodleXL.name: Cup Noodle Large
CupNoodleXL.effect: Increase X-axis range by +1 for two phases

CupNoodle.name: Cup Noodle
CupNoodle.effect: Increase X-axis range by +1 for one phase

CupRamenXL.name: Fire Chicken Large
CupRamenXL.effect: At the start of the phase, speed is 300%, then it rapidly decreases to 0%

CupRamen.name: Fire Chicken
CupRamen.effect: At the start of the phase, speed is 200%, then it slowly decreases to 0%

CupRiceXL.name: Cup Rice Large
CupRiceXL.effect: Soldier enhancement, speed reduction effects are doubled

OffBasePass.name: Off-Base Pass
OffBasePass.effect: Speed of enhanced soldiers +20%, weaken the soldier with the most workload in the next phase

RewardLeave.name: Reward Leave
RewardLeave.effect: All soldier speed +50% for this phase, the soldier with the most workload in the next phase will not participate and other soldiers are weakened

RewardLeaveForNoSmoke.name: No-Smoking Reward Leave
RewardLeaveForNoSmoke.effect: All soldier smoke -30% for this phase, the soldier with the most workload in the next phase will not participate and other soldiers are weakened

HotChicken.name: Hot Chicken
HotChicken.effect: Weakening is nullified for this stage

HotPocket.name: Hot Pocket
HotPocket.effect: Duration of received enhancement +1 phase for this stage

Risotto.name: Sea Snail Abalone Porridge
Risotto.effect: 50% probability to enhance all soldiers, 50% probability to weaken all soldiers

Churu.name: Churu
Churu.description: Two would eat, one would die unnoticed.
Churu.effect: For this stage, the number of 'Churu' used enhances the soldiers

TraffickingInClassifiedInformation.name: Trafficking in Classified Information
TraffickingInClassifiedInformation.effect: The first time a one-time reward is used in this stage, it will not be consumed.

Sabotage.name: Sabotage
Sabotage.effect: Consume all remaining cost to decrease supply by -n*(current phase number)%
